
# check num of comand line args
if [ $# -ne 1 ]; then
        echo "Please provide an input file"
        exit
fi

fin=$1

# check for existence
# MIND THE SPACES!
if [ -e ${fin} ]
then
            echo "unzipping file" ${fin}
    else
            echo "no such file"   ${fin}  " Exiting."
            exit
fi
